node.title: Daniel Andrews accuses PM of chasing votes of protesters who threatened him
node.alt: Victorian Premier Daniel Andrews and Australian Prime Minister Scott Morrison
node.description: Daniel Andrews accuses Prime Minister Scott Morrison of chasing the votes of fringe protesters who chanted violent threats against the Victorian Premier at the weekend.
node.content:
["Victoria's Premier Daniel Andrews has unloaded on the Prime Minister, accusing him of \"chasing the votes of extremists\" after his comments about the Melbourne protests.\u00a0", "Scott Morrison condemned the violent, anti-government protests, saying \"threats and intimidation\" had no place in Australia, while also suggesting he understood why the protesters were angry and resentful.", "Mr Morrison said that with such high vaccine coverage\u00a0it was time for the states to wind back their pandemic powers.", "\"There are many people who are feeling frustrated,\" he told reporters.\u00a0", "\"It's time for governments to step back and for Australians to take their lives back\".\u00a0", "Mr Andrews,\u00a0who has received death threats over his proposed pandemic laws,\u00a0stood by his approach while accusing Mr Morrison of saying one thing and meaning another.\u00a0", "\"We have seen extremists, rabid anti-vaxxers and others making all sorts of threats, threats against me, my wife and my kids,\" Mr Andrews told Channel Nine.", "\"I'm committed to doing what has to be done.\u00a0I'm not about chasing, through doublespeak, the votes of extremists or their preferences.\"", "", "
Some protesters in Melbourne on the weekend were seen calling for violence against politicians.(ABC News: Tim Callanan)
", "The Victorian Premier said his relationship with Mr Morrison would\u00a0improve \"when he stops doublespeaking to extremists\".", "\"It has taken too long for some to call out this sort of violence,\" he said.", "\"What do we want to see? Somebody getting hurt? That's not leadership.\"", "
More state leaders\u00a0join criticism of Morrison's comments
", "Mr Andrews's proposed pandemic laws have triggered large and angry protests in Melbourne, with demonstrators comparing him to Hitler and one wheeling out a makeshift gallows with nooses attached.\u00a0", "One man has been charged by Victorian Police with inciting protesters to make explosives, while another has been charged as part of the investigation.", "Mr Morrison said Australia was a \"civil and peaceful society\" and he had \"no tolerance\" for that kind of behaviour.\u00a0", "But it was his pivot to the frustrations being felt by Australians about the protracted lockdowns that has attracted criticism.\u00a0", "\"Over the last couple of years, governments have been telling Australians what to do,\" he said.\u00a0", "\"Now, there's been a need for that as we've gone through the pandemic. But the time is now to start rolling all of that back.\"", "The federal opposition likened Mr Morrison's behaviour to that of former US president Donald Trump, while West Australian Premier Mark McGowan accused him of dog whistling.", "Queensland's Deputy Premier Steven Miles suggested Mr Morrison was cosying up to a \"coalition of anti-vaxxers\" that has joined many of the anti-government protests.\u00a0", "Cabinet minister Peter Dutton,\u00a0who is from Queensland,\u00a0defended Mr Morrison's \"perfectly sensible remarks\".\u00a0", "\"That is, that the states in the plan they've signed up to, the commitment they gave to the country is when we got to 80 per cent\u00a0double vaccination rate we would go back to having to live with this,\" he told Channel Nine.", "\"That's the reality of where we are.\"", "", "
COVID cases surging across several European countries
"]
